author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Detection Technology Jan-March EBIT Stable At EUR 3.7 Million
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - DETECTION TECHNOLOGY OYJ:
* JAN-MARCH NET SALES INCREASED BY 2.4% TO EUR 19.3 MILLION (18.9)
* JAN-MARCH OPERATING PROFIT (EBIT) WAS EUR 3.7 MILLION (3.7)
* ESTIMATES THAT SALES WILL GROW IN FIRST HALF OF 2018 * THERE IS UNCERTAINTY REGARDING DEMAND, AND INTENSIFICATION OF COMPETITION MIGHT BE REFLECTED IN PRODUCT PRICES
* DETECTION TECHNOLOGYâ€™S MID-TERM BUSINESS OUTLOOK REMAINS UNCHANGED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
